title: Find a Lockout-Tagout (LOTO) Procedure
description: Before starting a repair, a technician must find the specific Lockout-Tagout (LOTO) procedure for the machine to ensure it is properly de-energized.

tasks.description: Identify the asset that requires the LOTO procedure.
Search the safety document library for the LOTO procedure specific to that asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the approved LOTO document.

tasks.description: Open the procedure, which details the specific energy sources (electrical, pneumatic, etc.) and the sequence for isolating them.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct, step-by-step safety procedure to follow before beginning work.
